meanings.sent1: The blindfolded man stumbled around viewlessly.
meanings.sent2: The dark room was viewlessly empty.
meanings.sent3: The invisible ghost was viewlessly haunting the old mansion.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were viewlessly lost in the fog of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The viewlessly vast desert stretched endlessly before them.

meanings.definition: In a manner that lacks visibility or perspective.
meanings.sent1: She moved viewlessly through the dense fog.
meanings.sent2: The mist obscured the landscape viewlessly.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear viewlessly.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass viewlessly as they chatted away.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone viewlessly in the pitch-black sky.
